DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of study is to compare the effect of coagulation profile in patients receiving intraoperative balanced salt colloid undergoing spinal cord tumor surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Impact of Balanced Slat Colloid HES 130/0.42 on Coagulation Profiles in Patients Undergoing Spinal Cord Tumor Surgery
DOC.criteria: adult patients over the age of 20 scheduled for spinal tumor removal and fixation 1. Renal failure 2. Preexisting congestive heart failure(NYHA III ~ IV) 3. Anemia 4. Coagulopathy 5. Abnormal liver function 6. Anti coagulation/Anti platelet ,edication 7. Foreigner, illiterate 8. Disabled person,
DOC.keyword: balanced salt colloid, coagulation profiles, spinal cord tumor
